banner.title: Hippolyte Gautheron
banner.description: I focus on writing clear optimized, and reusable code. I currently use Angular and Java (with Spring Boot framework), which allows me to develop reliable and efficient software solutions.

about.title: About
description: Passionate about computers and technologies since I was a kid, I started my journey with mods for video games. After completing a technology degree, I decided to make it my profession

I devote my free time to more creative projects that allow me to experiment with new ways of coding and try out new technologies, but also to my passion for climbing and hiking, whether on foot or by bike.
Some of the technologies that I have trained and worked on include :

angular.title: Angular
angular.description: I use Angular on a daily basis to build custom applications.

tailwind.title: TailwindCSS
tailwind.description: I use TailwindCSS since 2021. For me it's the best CSS tools.

backend.title: Backend with JAVA and Spring Boot Framework
backend.description: I have extensive experience with Java Spring Boot, enabling me to build robust, scalable, and efficient web applications and microservices.

typescript.title: Typescript lover !
typescript.description: I use TypeScript to build reliable and maintainable code.

continuous.title: Continuous integration with GitLab
continuous.description: I regularly use GitLab and agile methodologies to work efficiently.
